definitions.definition: A substance , especially a medication , applied externally (to the surface of the skin or eye ).
A joke dealing with current events or topical subjects .
A postage stamp depicting a particular theme or subject (such as birds or trains), potentially sought out by topical stamp collectors .

main_definition: A substance , especially a medication , applied externally (to the surface of the skin or eye ).
secondary_definitions: A joke dealing with current events or topical subjects .
( philately ) A postage stamp depicting a particular theme or subject (such as birds or trains), potentially sought out by topical stamp collectors .
